name: Portal Space [prototype]
description:
A small project I am working on. As of right now, anything is up to change, and most things will likely change. However, I do want to get some early feedback.

This game is really early on, you can complete it in a few minutes, the save system is non-existent, and you close the game with Alt+F4. Odds are you can figure out things as you play, but just for sake of documentation, I made an instruction.
